title: Vendor listing Greentech India
meta_description: Greentech India Material Handling LLP is a leading solution provider for material handling, emphasizing sustainability and innovation. As the parent company of MHE Bazar, Greentech India offers a wide range of material handling equipment, including forklifts, pallet trucks, and stackers, as well as lithium-ion battery conversion kits. Their services extend to rental and maintenance solutions, ensuring that equipment remains reliable and efficient. With a commitment to enhancing operational efficiency and reducing environmental impact, Greentech India is a trusted partner for businesses seeking advanced material handling solutions.

title: Vendor listing Tallboy
meta_description: Tallboy is a foremost company that innovates technology in aerial scissor lifts, designed and manufactured within the National Capital Region (NCR) of India. Based in Faridabad, Haryana, Tallboy focuses on enhancing safety and efficiency at elevated work sites. Their product line includes various types of aerial platforms tailored for different industrial applications. Known for their reliability and ease of use, Tallboy's scissor lifts are designed to meet the highest standards of performance and durability, making them an essential asset for construction, maintenance, and warehouse operations.

title: Vendor listing Supra
meta_description: Supra, a brand under Speciality Urethanes Pvt. Ltd., is renowned for its high-quality cast polyurethane products. Incorporated in 1991 and located in Satara, Maharashtra, Supra specializes in manufacturing a wide selection of wheels used in various material handling equipment. Their products are essential components in stackers, pallet trucks, reach trucks, automated storage and retrieval systems (ASRS), automated guided vehicles (AGVs), conveyor systems, and trolleys. Known for its technological capabilities, superior quality, and reliability, Supra serves over 3,000 satisfied customers across diverse industrial segments.

title: Vendor listing Unik
meta_description: Unik Batteries Pvt. Ltd. is a leading manufacturer and exporter of industrial batteries based in Pune, India. Specializing in traction and semi-traction batteries, Unik Batteries was founded in 1996 and has grown to serve over 1,200 clients worldwide, exporting to more than 25 countries. Known for their high-quality products, Unik Batteries produces a range of batteries for material handling equipment such as forklifts, pallet trucks, and automated guided vehicles (AGVs). They also cater to other sectors, supplying batteries for cleaning equipment, golf carts, solar photovoltaic systems, and power substations. Unik Batteries is distinguished by its innovation, quality, and customer-oriented approach in the battery industry.

title: Vendor listing Manasi Engineering
meta_description: Manasi Engineering, established in 2021 and based in Mumbai, Maharashtra, specializes in manufacturing a wide range of material handling equipment. Recognized as a micro-enterprise, the company offers robust solutions tailored to the industrial sector's needs. Their product line includes hand pallet trucks, goods lifts, and other lifting and handling equipment. Known for their reliability and customization options, Manasi Engineering's products are designed to optimize efficiency and safety in warehouses and industrial settings. With a commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction, Manasi Engineering stands out as a dependable partner for material handling solutions.

title: Vendor listing Logisnext

title: Vendor listing Troax
meta_description: Troax is a global leader in providing innovative mesh panel solutions designed to enhance safety and security in industrial environments. Founded in 1955 in Sweden, Troax specializes in high-quality metal-based mesh panels used for machine guarding, warehouse partitioning, and property protection. The company's products are renowned for their durability, flexibility, and compliance with international safety standards. Troax offers a wide range of solutions, including machine guarding panels, partition walls, anti-collapse systems, and mezzanine floors, all engineered to protect personnel, property, and processes. With a strong global presence spanning over 40 countries, Troax combines local insights with international expertise to deliver customized safety solutions that meet the specific needs of its clients​ (Aguatechengg)​ (Tofler)​.
